subject: Central Bank of Nigeria
body:
Central Bank of Nigeria
                                                    Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
                                    Central Business District, Cadastral Zone
                                     Abuja, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria.
Attn: 
We are in receipt of your message and personal details provided as requested except your means of identification which was not included, please provide your means of identification because is very important.
Secondly, would you want to receive the payment value $5.5Million via bank transfer to your bank account which will take 72hrs or will you want it delivered to you in cash as a consignment through a diplomatic method?
We look forward to hear from you so that we will be able to conclude every arrangements concerning your payment before the end of 1st face of October.
Best Regards
Alhaji Aliu Maitama
Secretary to the Governor
Central Bank of Nigeria
Telephone: 2349073516600

subject: Re:   Central Bank of Nigeria
body:
Dear Alhaji Aliu Maitama,

Thank you for your prompt response. I apologize for the oversight, my means of identification is my passport, which I can provide a scanned copy of if necessary.

As for the payment method, I would prefer a bank transfer to my account. Please let me know what information you need from me to facilitate this.

I look forward to concluding this matter promptly.

Best wishes,
Evelyn
